| 4 |  | #P_df-mat | |- Mat = ( a e. Fin , b e. _V |-> ( ( b freeLMod ( a X. a ) ) sSet <. ( .r ` ndx ) , ( b maMul <. a , a , a >. ) >. ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_mpt2ndm0 | |- ( -. ( N e. Fin /\ R e. _V ) -> ( N Mat R ) = (/) ) |
| 6 | 1, 5 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( -. ( N e. Fin /\ R e. _V ) -> A = (/) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( -. ( N e. Fin /\ R e. _V ) -> ( Base ` A ) = ( Base ` (/) ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_base0 | |- (/) = ( Base ` (/) ) |
